questions: You tend to get along well with most people you meet and enjoy working as a team.
You learn musical notes quickly and/or enjoy composing songs
You enjoy reading books and/or articles on a regular basis
You are easy to understand and apply concepts related to geometry, such as angles, shapes and spatial structures.
You enjoy expressing yourself through movement, whether dancing, acting, or doing artistic activities that involve your body.
When listening to music, do you recognize notes, tones, rhythms and patterns?
You enjoy solving puzzles, mazes, or games that require thinking in spatial terms
You have outstanding skills in physical activities or sports that require coordination and body control
You are aware of your own emotions and how they affect you in your daily life
Do you express yourself clearly when communicating orally or in writing?
Do you offer help to sick, elderly people or friends?
Do you know how to play a musical instrument or have you ever sung in public?
Do you like working with numbers and performing mental calculations quickly and accurately?
Do you have the ease of understanding and applying mathematical concepts such as algebra, geometry and statistics?
Have you demonstrated outstanding skills in activities such as drawing, graphic design, or sculpture?
Do you easily identify patterns, relationships and numerical sequences?
Are you clear about your long-term personal goals and objectives, and do you follow an action plan to achieve them?
Can you handle stress and challenging situations effectively?
Do you enjoy writing stories, poetry or song lyrics?
Do you find it easy to imitate other people's movements or gestures accurately?
Do you find it easy to understand the emotions and feelings of others?
Do you exercise or do physical work
Would you like to do some of these activities: technical drawing, hairdressing, carpentry, repair, artistic projects
Are you a good negotiator and do you find it easy to make deals with people?
Do you enjoy playing puzzle games, solving strategies, playing cards or chess?
You think you have musical talent or skill that you have never been able to develop
Do you enjoy planning your personal goals, for example using agendas and/or schedules?
Do your friends or family members often come to you to talk about their personal concerns or ask for advice?
